t: Is Baldwin door hardware worth the $$ - Fine Homebuilding
s: April 17, 2007 - All is made by Baldwin and expect for the cabinet hinges they are all finished in their oil rubbed bronze. The total delivered price is $1100. The major costs are hinges at about $24 a piece and door knobs at about $60 a piece. I do not have much experience with door hardware. I would like a quality product…this would include a durable finish and a smooth/solid feel. Are there other brands ...
